text: Joaquín Almunia Amann (born 17 June 1948) is a Spanish politician. He was President of the European Commissioner for Competition (2009–2014). From 1997 to 2000, he was the leader of the opposition as secretary general of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish politicians Category:European Union politicians Category:People from Bilbao
title: Joaquín Almunia
